title: Quantitative microbial risk assessment of gastrointestinal illness due to recreational exposure to E. coli and enterococci on the southern coasts of the Caspian Sea
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Hadi Niknejad, Somayeh Hoseinvandtabar, Maryam Panahandeh, Fathollah Gholami-Borujeni, Reihaneh Janipoor, Roghayeh Abedi Sarvestani, Reza Saeedi, Mohsen Hesami Arani, Mehrnoosh Abtahi, Mohammad Rafiee
